resources.string:
Welcome to the new version of RingyDingyDingy!
 
 This version brings lots of bug fixes, and a few new features.
 Please read the instructions that you'll see when you tap OK for information on how to use this app.
 If you have any problems, please e-mail us directly at ringydingydingy@0x3b.com.
 If you post a negative review on Google Play, we can't respond to you and help fix the problem.
 
 New features:
 * Notification that can be tapped to quickly enable/disable RingyDingyDingy (can be turned off in Settings)
 * Pager function that is the same as a remote ring, but displays a message as well (disabled by default; uses a different activation code)
